columns.name: _checkActions
columns.description: References to CheckActions performed for the Activity

columns.description: Enum stating the status of the Activity

columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.description: Reference to Services this Activity is executed for

columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.description: Short text holding the process number if necessary
